author: gpetruc
body:
80X port of the fix from @HuguesBrun for the muon T&P: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/4916b86d5adf6e6695d13a336f1d9aeb9d32c000
Does not run in production.
PR is rooted on `CMSSW_8_0_1`, but merges also in 81X: should I make two PRs or auto-forward-port is still enabled from 80X to 81X?

@battibas @GLP90
title: Trigger matching with tracker muons (80X)
